title: Implement and run Veo Capability Probe script
description: Create a diagnostic script to matrix-test 3.1 models against R2V, 4K, and 9:16 aspect ratios to identify exact allowlisting status.
close_reason: Completed capability discovery probe and rightsized configurations. R2V enabled for 3.1-preview only as verified. 4K disabled due to allowlist. rewriter logic refined to standard enhance_prompt.

title: Rightsize veo_models.py with verified 4K and R2V capabilities
description: Update config/veo_models.py based on the latest probe results: enable 4K globally for 3.1 and enable R2V for 3.1-fast-preview.
close_reason: Rightsized configurations based on probe results and successfully verified via full end-to-end generation integration tests (4K, R2V, Interpolation, Audio).

title: Rightsize veo_models.py based on probe results
description: Update the model configuration with verified capabilities to prevent user errors.
close_reason: Completed capability discovery probe and rightsized configurations. R2V enabled for 3.1-preview only as verified. 4K disabled due to allowlist. rewriter logic refined to standard enhance_prompt.

title: Implement high-visibility 4K badges for Veo outputs
description: Add distinct 4K badges/pills to the Veo generation page and Media Library grid to clearly identify Ultra HD content.
close_reason: Implemented high-visibility gold 4K badges in the Veo generation page, library grid, and details dialog.

title: Veo 3.1 GA Feature Discovery and Integration
description: Comprehensive effort to discover, validate, and integrate the GA features of Veo 3.1, including R2V, 4K resolution, and the Social Rewriter.
close_reason: All Veo 3.1 GA discovery and integration tasks completed and verified.

title: Validate and integrate Social Rewriter
description: Determine the correct SDK/API parameter for the Social Rewriter and integrate it into the generation workflow.
close_reason: Completed capability discovery probe and rightsized configurations. R2V enabled for 3.1-preview only as verified. 4K disabled due to allowlist. rewriter logic refined to standard enhance_prompt.

title: Integrate and validate Veo 3.1 GA features
description: Integrated Veo 3.1 features (R2V, 4K, social rewriter). Validation tests confirmed that R2V and 4K are blocked by project allowlisting. Social rewriter parameter is not yet supported by SDK v1.56.0.
close_reason: Integration completed and verified via capability probe. Ground truth configs established.

title: Implement 'Full Generation' integration test using veo_models config
description: Create or update an integration test that iterates through VEO_MODELS and performs a full generation (polling for completion) for the new 4K and R2V modes.
close_reason: Rightsized configurations based on probe results and successfully verified via full end-to-end generation integration tests (4K, R2V, Interpolation, Audio).
